title: Credit Card help
body: I need my credit card information, but I don't currently have the one that I used for League on me. Is there anyway to check it from the launcher or can I get an email or something like that?

replies.body: It's fixed now. It wasn't that my account was hacked or anything, I just needed the card number really bad at the time. I asked my mom and I got the number.

If I understand your question correctly, you want to get your card details but don't have your card handy.

Sadly your card information isn't stored in a way that would be valuable to you in this situation. Your best bet would be to contact the card provider.

> [{quoted}](name=2o2,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7jTr00i3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-17T08:16:41.930+0000)
>
> If I understand your question correctly, you want to get your card details but don't have your card handy.
> 
> Sadly your card information isn't stored in a way that would be valuable to you in this situation. Your best bet would be to contact the card provider.

tbh this sounds like his account got hacked and someone is trying to get his credit card. You might want to lock the account and make him reset his password and stuff.
